name: Rattlesnake Ridge
description:
Information:

Rattlesnake Ridge is a short horror game where you are a photographer trying to take photos of constellations.  Check your journal with "Q" to see what constellations you have to take a photo of and then look to the night sky to find them. Check your watch with "E" to make sure you aren't running out of time. But most importantly press "Space" to see what may be lurking behind you. In astrophotography a normal shutter speed is 20 which makes it so that it takes 20 seconds to take a photo. So make sure that you balance taking photos and checking behind you because you can't stop the camera once you have taken a photo and any bright light would mess up the photo.

Controls:

  • Mouse to Look
  • E to view Journal
  • Q to view Watch
  • Left Mouse to take a photo
  • Right Mouse to zoom
  • Space to look behind you

Extra Information:

This is my very first game which was made in a little above 2 weeks as a summer project of mine. I'd appreciate any feedback given and if you come across any bugs. I'm sorry.
